title: Indented Footnote Content Not Supported
message: Quarto markdown does not support indented footnote content. Use the div syntax instead: `::: ^ref ... :::`.

notes.message: This footnote definition has indented content, which is not supported in quarto markdown.
notes.label: footnote-def

notes.message:
For multi-paragraph footnotes, use the div syntax:

::: ^ref

First paragraph.

Second paragraph.

:::.
notes.label: suggestion
